name: Human
description: Ambition alone drives countless humans, and for many, adventuring serves as a means to an end, whether it be wealth, acclaim, social status, or arcane knowledge. A few pursue adventuring careers simply for the thrill of danger. Humans hail from myriad regions and backgrounds, and as such can fill any role within an adventuring party

_standard.json.name: Human (Standard)
_standard.json.description:
Medium character with 30ft movement speed
 +2 bonus to any base attribute
 bonus feat at lvl 1
 extra skill point with every level
